text.section:
Sec. 8E-12. Additional enforcement.
In addition to other methods for enforcement provided in this Chapter, the Miami-Dade County Building Code Compliance Office shall be authorized to enforce the provisions of this Section through the issuance of civil violations fines in the manner more specifically provided in of this Code. Violation of this Chapter involving any damages to the public health and safety may also be addressed by the County through an action in court for injunctive or other available relief.
